about_the_game:
Experience the music of Watashi Suzume with this digital collection of all of the originally recorded music featured in our debut project!
This collection was developed and mastered by talented musicians specifically to help bring the world of Watashi Suzume to life.
Our thanks for their contributions, and may this serve as a celebration of the music of Watashi Suzume!

Includes all the original game tracks in mp3 format for ease of use.
